data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Nassarawa, Nigeria be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nassarawa, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Nassarawa, Nigeria to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Nassarawa, Nigeria a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Nassarawa, Nigeria, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Koro Nulu people.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Nassarawa, Nigeria from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Nassarawa, Nigeria by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Nassarawa, Nigeria.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

location.name: Nassarawa
location.people_groups_list: Megili, Jukun, Wanu, Ikpeshe, Mama, Kwarra, Kami
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Megili (106,000), Jukun, Wanu (5,700), Ikpeshe (9,400), Mama, Kwarra (63,000), Kami (10,000)
